preview: Barleria cristata is used for its anti-inflammatory properties in treating swelling and pain.

name: Mamsarohini
preview: Soymida febrifuga is a potent astringent used for wound healing and treating diarrhea.

name: Medasaka

name: Icchabhedi rasa

name: Aivana
preview: Hyoscyamus niger (Henbane) is a toxic nervine sedative used in purified, minute doses for pain and convulsions.

name: Asphota

name: Brihatyadi Kashayam
